func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM rulesData" +
            " WHERE" +
            " ('" + msg.mqtt.topic + "' LIKE topicPattern)" +
            " AND" +
            " ('" + msg.mqtt.payload + "' LIKE payloadPattern)" +
            " AND active=0x01";

return msg;

name: dashboard CSS
format:
<style id="blue-dashboard">

body.nr-dashboard-theme {
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, #6FD7F4 10.32%, #B9D1DF 64.55%, #C1CAE3 100%);
}

body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
   background:rgba(85, 149, 176, 0.56);
}

/* side-navi */

body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {
    background: linear-gradient(270deg, #59D1F2 10.06%, #72D8F4 40.45%, #90DEF4 65.97%, #B9E7F4 89.41%);
}

body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
    color: rgb(0 0 0);
    background-color: transparent;
}

/*

each card panel

    justify-content:space-around;
*/
body.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
    position: absolute;
    margin-top : 7%; /* additional property*/
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,255,255,0.1) 0%, rgba(255,255,255,0.05) 100%);
    border: 5px solid #4B539C;
    border-radius: 1em;
    box-shadow: 0 0 1em 0em rgb(0 0 100 / 50%);
}

body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
    background: transparent;
    color: rgb(75,83,156); /* Basic : rgb(215 223 245); */
    font-weight: bold; /* additional property */
   
    
}


.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-template {
    background:transparent;
}



.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
    color: #000000; /* additional property*/
    font-size: 25px; /* additional property*/
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 0px rgb(0 0 0 / 50%);
    font-weight: bolder; /* additional property*/
}


.md-button{
    border-radius:0.6em;
    color: #000000; /*fixed. but I don't know what this code do. */
}



.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
    background-color: #053ea8; 
    color:rgb(215 223 245);
    font-size: 15px; /* additional property*/
    font-weight: bold; /* additional property*/
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:hover {
    background-color: #8AA9E1;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button:focus {
    background-color: #8AA9E1;
}

/* here now */

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-numeric .value {
    background:unset;
    color: rgb(215 223 245);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-form {
    color:rgb(215 223 245);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-form-button {
    background-color: #053ea8;
    color:rgb(215 223 245);
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-form-button:hover {
    background-color: #0646bd !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-form-button:focus {
    background-color: #0646bd !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-input-container.md-default-theme .md-input, md-input-container .md-input {
     color:rgb(215 223 245);
    border-color: #074fd4 !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch .md-thumb {
    background-color: rgb(25 31 153);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch .md-bar {
    background-color: rgb(94 94 177);
    box-shadow: inset 0 0 1px #0000005e;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch.md-checked .md-bar {
    background-color: rgb(94 94 177);
     box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0px #101086;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-switch md-switch.md-checked .md-thumb {
    background-color: rgb(61 107 232);
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0px #101086;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-track {
    background-color: rgb(125 172 249 / 35%);
}
md-slider .md-thumb {
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px 0px #101086;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-slider .md-thumb:after {
    background-color: #3d6be8;
    border-color: #3d6be8;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu, .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
    background-color: rgb(0 0 0 / 12%);
    color:rgb(215 223 245);
    border-radius:0.8em;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value, .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown md-select .md-select-value.md-select-placeholder {
    margin-top: -3px;
    border-color: #eeeeee7a;
    
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .md-select-menu-container {
    max-height: 85%;
    overflow-y: auto;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0.8em;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-dropdown .md-select-icon {

}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
    background-color: rgb(40 53 147);
   
    height: 29px;
    border-radius: 0.6em;
    margin-left: 10px;
    margin-right: 10px;
    margin-top: 2px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 6px 6px #24202133;
    transition: 0.3s;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
    color: rgb(130 177 255) !important;
    background-color: rgb(27 90 197) !important;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:nth-child(even) {
    background-color: rgb(31 31 152);
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:last-child {
   margin-bottom: 8px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option:hover {
    background-color: rgb(20 91 211) !important;
    padding-left: 26px;
}
.nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option > .md-ripple-container{
     border-radius: 14px;
}

.formlabel{
    color : black;
}

</style>

name: Return UTC
getUTC
info:
params:
    msg.req.params.time:    HTTP Requested Time
    msg.req.userToken:      HTTP Bearer Token
    
Return:
    msg.utc:                Converted UTC

name: CreateQuery
func:
msg.topic = "INSERT INTO scheduleData" +
            " (time, uid, topic, payload)" +
            " VALUES" +
            ` ('${msg.utc}', '${msg.req.userToken}', '${msg.req.params.topic}', '${msg.req.params.payload}');`

return msg;

name: CreateQuery
func:
msg.topic = "DELETE FROM scheduleData" +
            " WHERE id = " + msg.req.params.id +
            " AND uid = '" + msg.req.userToken + "';"

return msg;
